message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product.  Given its value, I'm asking for $18,000 to start negotiations.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I think the price is a bit too high. I'm willing to pay $15,000 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective on the price.  While I'm not willing to go that low, I could meet you at $16,500.  I believe this reflects the true value of the product.
I understand your perspective on the value of the product, but I still think $16,500 is a bit high. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $16,000. Can you consider this offer?
